content.prompt_es:
Fill in the blanks with the correct form of the word in parentheses.

Base words: (1) POLLUTE, (2) SOLVE, (3) RECYCLE, (4) CONSERVE, (5) FUTURE
content.main_text: The problem of (1)___ (pollute) is very serious. Many people are working on (2)___ (solve) this issue. One solution is to promote (3)___ (recycle) in our communities. It's important for children to learn about (4)___ (conserve) nature and the environment. We must act now to ensure a better (5)___ (future) for the planet.
content.explanation:
(1) La palabra 'pollution' es el sustantivo que se forma a partir del verbo 'pollute'.
(2) La palabra 'solution' es el sustantivo que se deriva del verbo 'solve'.
(3) La palabra 'recycling' es el gerundio que se forma a partir del verbo 'recycle'.
(4) La palabra 'conservation' es el sustantivo relacionado con el verbo 'conserve'.
(5) La palabra 'futurity' se refiere a la condición o tiempo del futuro, aunque es menos común.
